name: Heart Roots
description:
Top-down, action single-player 3D about survive and sacrifice.

You were the one chosen as a sacrifice to calm the wrath of the gods. And since you have refused now they are going to get you, you will have to survive the challenge they impose on you if you want to continue living

This was made as a college project.

Controls:

     wasd: Movement

     Space-bar: Dash

     E: Heal

     Left click: Atack

The Team:

     Joan Aguilera

     Adrià Gumbert
